bg.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_SEND_MESSAGES_PE:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Send Messages` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send & display my Role Menus here!
bg.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_VIEW_CHANNEL_PER:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `View Channel` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send, display, and edit my Role Menus here!
bg.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_READ_MESSAGE_HIS:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Read Message History` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to see & edit my existing Role Menus here!
bg.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_INVALID_MENU_ID: Sorry, but that doesn't seem to be a valid ID for an existing Role Menu of mine in this Channel or Server.
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_INVALID_THREAD_CHANNEL:
Sorry, but a Thread cannot be selected if its within a Text or Announcement Channel.
If you want to subscribe a Thread to the Discord Outage Feed, please pick a Thread that is within a Forum Channel.
Otherwise, you can select a standard Text Channel instead.
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_MISSING_WEBHOOKS_PERMISS: Sorry, but my Discord Outage Feed cannot be subscribed to Channels (or Forum Posts) in which I do not have both the "View Channel" and "Manage Webhooks" Permissions!
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_SUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to subscribe to the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED:
This Server is already subscribed to the Discord Outage Feed!
If you want to remove the existing Feed in this Server, please use the {{COMMAND}} Command.
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_UNSUBSCRIBED: You cannot unsubscribe this Server from the Discord Outage Feed when it is *not currently* subscribed!
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_WEBHOOK_DELETION: ⚠ An error occurred while I was trying to delete the Webhook for this Feed. You will have to delete the Webhook manually in Server Settings > Integrations!
bg.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_UNSUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to unsubscribe from the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.

I need that Permission in order to grant and revoke Roles in the Self-Assignable Role Menus!
da.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_SEND_MESSAGES_PE:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Send Messages` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send & display my Role Menus here!
da.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_VIEW_CHANNEL_PER:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `View Channel` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send, display, and edit my Role Menus here!
da.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_READ_MESSAGE_HIS:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Read Message History` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to see & edit my existing Role Menus here!
da.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_INVALID_MENU_ID: Sorry, but that doesn't seem to be a valid ID for an existing Role Menu of mine in this Channel or Server.
da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_INVALID_THREAD_CHANNEL:
Sorry, but a Thread cannot be selected if its within a Text or Announcement Channel.
If you want to subscribe a Thread to the Discord Outage Feed, please pick a Thread that is within a Forum Channel.
Otherwise, you can select a standard Text Channel instead.
da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_MISSING_WEBHOOKS_PERMISS: Sorry, but my Discord Outage Feed cannot be subscribed to Channels (or Forum Posts) in which I do not have both the "View Channel" and "Manage Webhooks" Permissions!
da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_SUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to subscribe to the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.
da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED:

If you want to remove the existing Feed in this Server, please use the {{COMMAND}} Command.
da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_UNSUBSCRIBED: You cannot unsubscribe this Server from the Discord Outage Feed when it is *not currently* subscribed!

da.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_UNSUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to unsubscribe from the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.

If so, please wait and try again later.

lt.INFO_USER_COMMAND_MEMBER_NOT_PART_OF_GUI: Sorry, but that User isn't a part of this Server!

lt.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_MANAGE_ROLES_PER:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Manage Roles` Permission on this Server.
I need that Permission in order to grant and revoke Roles in the Self-Assignable Role Menus!
lt.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_SEND_MESSAGES_PE:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Send Messages` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send & display my Role Menus here!
lt.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_VIEW_CHANNEL_PER:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `View Channel` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to send, display, and edit my Role Menus here!
lt.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_BOT_NO_READ_MESSAGE_HIS:
Sorry, but I do not seem to have the `Read Message History` Permission in this Channel.
I need that Permission in order to see & edit my existing Role Menus here!
lt.ROLEMENU_COMMAND_INVALID_MENU_ID: Sorry, but that doesn't seem to be a valid ID for an existing Role Menu of mine in this Channel or Server.
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_INVALID_THREAD_CHANNEL:
Sorry, but a Thread cannot be selected if its within a Text or Announcement Channel.
If you want to subscribe a Thread to the Discord Outage Feed, please pick a Thread that is within a Forum Channel.
Otherwise, you can select a standard Text Channel instead.
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_MISSING_WEBHOOKS_PERMISS: Sorry, but my Discord Outage Feed cannot be subscribed to Channels (or Forum Posts) in which I do not have both the "View Channel" and "Manage Webhooks" Permissions!
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_SUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to subscribe to the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED:
This Server is already subscribed to the Discord Outage Feed!
If you want to remove the existing Feed in this Server, please use the {{COMMAND}} Command.
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_ALREADY_UNSUBSCRIBED: You cannot unsubscribe this Server from the Discord Outage Feed when it is *not currently* subscribed!
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_WEBHOOK_DELETION: ⚠ An error occurred while I was trying to delete the Webhook for this Feed. You will have to delete the Webhook manually in Server Settings > Integrations!
lt.DSTATUS_COMMAND_FAILED_TO_UNSUBSCRIBE: Sorry, something went wrong while trying to unsubscribe from the Discord Outage Feed... Please try again later.
